titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th Anniversary of the founding of the American Association for Cancer Research and declaring the month of May National Cancer Research Month.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/24/2007--Introduced. Congratulates the American Association for Cancer Research on its 100-year anniversary celebration. Expresses gratitude for the Association's contributions toward progress in advancing cancer research.Declares the month of May to be National Cancer Research Month to support the Association's public education efforts to make cancer research a national and international priority.
